post.text: "It is ridiculous that there has never been a female president before."

comment.author: Daniel
comment.text: see it's all about being a women,why would any serious person running for office endorse little kids that were told wat to write by a Clinton advisors. Is she that worried? I think she better worry but this isnt the answer,like these kids knew Washinton/ Obama ect. Stupid post. I didnt hear a thing about her sukn Obama. Get real...

replies.author: Vincent
replies.text: They can't get real Daniel...they are just way too fake!! And the thing is...a lot of dummies will be swayed by this!!ðŸ™„

replies.text: so true Vincent,she will destroy us,be sad to be first lady President and the assasinated,people hate her that much,I'd never run if I had her repitation,that shows rite there she is not playing with all her senses... :) xx
